name: geobasisdaten.ch
description: Geo data portal provided by the 'Konferenz der kantonalen Geoinformations- und Katasterstellen'. In Switzerland, the basic geodata catalog is a catalog-like listing of all geodata that have been collected by a legal authority by linking them to underlying legal enactments. In addition to a visualization of the geo data recorded by geo information law, its function is the database-specific assignment of responsible bodies and other legally relevant attributes.
owner_name: Konferenz der kantonalen Geoinformations- und Katasterstellen
